project.title: CariBoss
project.concept: This project was my very first project as a freelancer in UI/UX Design. I got an offer from my friend that works there. I help to create their first UI/UX design, their color palettes, and also their first logo. CariBoss is an application that aims to connect Boss and job seekers. It has many features, some of them were CV Analyzer, Job discovery feature, Articles for tips and tricks, and many more.
project.jobdesk: Create UI design for application, Research for target market, Create logo and their color palettes

project.title: MyTekkom
project.concept: MyTekkom was the very first application I create and its main purpose is to create a better flow of information around the computer engineering department. As a new department, the computer engineering department has so much room for improvement especially in the information sector since this department also does not have Himpunan Mahasiswa.
project.reasoning: The computer engineering department is a new department that was established in 2012 yet there is so much room for improvement especially when the pandemic hit in 2020. Some of the room for improvement were the flow of information. Due to no himpunan mahasiswa that is not covering the communication between management and student, the flow of information often being a big problem.
project.feature: This prototype of the application is capable to arrange schedules for a room rental around the computer engineering building, also capable to create and read information as one portal of information about what happened around computer engineering and also ITS campus, and searching for information about the subject’s syllabus and problems example for every subject.
project.jobdesk: Create the flow for the application, Create UI design for application, Develop application using Flutter Framework, Create the database using Firebase, Create authentication using Firebase, Create multi-role account, Using packages library

project.title: INHES
project.concept: INHES is a protoype of a smart app designed to help people self-diagnose disease in everywhere, even in the place where the healthcare facilities not proper enough. Have you ever wondering, what if every people can have immediate access to diagnose their health, or can we make the flow of healthcare simpler, and make new trends where every disease can be addressed immediately?
project.reasoning: By June 2021, the daily COVID-19 test per thousand people of Indonesia is only 0.21. Means, only 210 in 1,000,000 people are getting tested for COVID-19 per day. This, maybe happened due to the healthcare facilities that are not accessible to every person in every corner of this country. From the problem stated above, what we want to tackle is how to diagnose COVID-19 through its minor symptoms and also how to shorten the flow of the healthcare process, so that diseases can be addressed properly and treated immediately.
project.feature: This prototype of the application is capable of doing self-diagnose for COVID-19 disease based on its minor symptoms. This is possible, because of machine learning technology that studied over 5000+ cases which 450 of them were unique cases. This model was created using machine learning and gets an accuracy above 91%. Another prototype feature is to create an appointment with certain healthcare facilities which by the time this application was created are implement using CRUD method.
project.jobdesk: Create overall application concept, Create UI design for the application, Develop application using Kotlin, Create the database using Firebase, Create authentication using Firebase, Create an input-output model from Tensorflow Lite model (Model from local storage) for COVID-19 Self Diagnose feature

project.title: Design PV
project.concept: Design PV is an application conceptualized by Abigail and developed by Hakim from December 2021 to January 2022 its main purpose is to analyze the potential power that can be generated by solar power based on solar irradiance modeling, to calculate the amount of capacity that can be installed in an area, and to measure the investment costs and benefits obtained from the solar cell installation plan.
project.reasoning: The highest energy demand comes from the household sector with the type of demand, namely electrical energy. Also the global goals namely SDGs point 7 about affordable and clean energy which specifically mentioned to ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable, and modern energy for all.
project.feature: This prototype of the application is capable of doing analyzation of the potential power that can be generated by solar power based on solar irradiance modeling, also to calculate the amount of capacity that can be installed in an area, and measuring the investment costs and benefits obtained from the solar cell installation plan. This is possible because the calculation that was conceptualized by Abigail used certain formulas that later I translate into a Python program and uploaded to the cloud and used in the application.
project.jobdesk: Create the flow for the application, Create UI design for application, Develop application using Flutter Framework, Create API for calculation using Python, Deploy APIs using Flask and Heroku, Consume APIs

project.title: CoolPat
project.concept: CoolPat is an application created by Hakim in March 2022 that is designed to help people search for inspiration about color palettes and color combinations to beautify their product looks.
project.reasoning: Mental blocks are common problems that happen to all professions. To some creators, lack of creativity is a big deal since it can block productivity. What I try to tackle is how to give color inspiration to product creators to help them seek an inspiration color.
project.feature: This prototype of the application is capable to search for color palettes, change only certain color and keep the selected color, and lastly saving it to their library for later uses (if the user has already signed in).
project.jobdesk: Create the flow for the application, Create UI design for application, Develop application using Flutter Framework, Create the database using Firebase, Create authentication using Firebase, Consume APIs

project.title: JobIgnite
project.concept: JobIgnite is an application created by Hakim from February to June 2022 that is designed to help people to seek a job. The reason why I made this application is to help recruiters and job seekers in one platform to find another.
project.reasoning: During the year 2021, the amount of jobless people in Indonesia is around 6.49% of their total population. It may possibly happen due to a lack of job fields that is available or because of the impact of the pandemic COVID-19 so the spread of information about job vacancies is harder to find.
project.feature: For recruiters, this prototype of the application is capable to create information about job vacancies, seek for candidates with certain requirements or seek based on their profile of interest. For job seekers, this prototype of the application is capable to search for information about job vacancies, and also capable to bookmark their favorite job vacancies.
project.jobdesk: Create the flow for the application, Create UI design for application, Develop application using Flutter Framework, Create the database using Firebase, Create authentication using Firebase, Create multi-role account

project.title: Katakan
project.concept: Katakan is an app designed to help children to stimulate their speaking ability by asking them to say out loud the vocabulary they learn in the App.
project.reasoning: Children with speech delays most likely have problems in the frontal lobe (speech & language manipulation). They need stimulation to communicate what is on their mind. To tackle this problem, we create Katakan. Katakan is an iOS application that engage children to speak as they learn new vocabularies based on daily activities in the form of a game. Katakan helps to stimulate children's speaking ability by asking them to say out loud the vocabulary they learn from the app.
project.feature: This prototype of application is capable to recognize Indonesian speech using Speech Recognition framework and also capable to do text to speech task. Katakan is used to engage children to learn and speak Indonesian nouns and verbs based on common daily activities, listen to the audio provided for articulation guidance, and using gamification method so the children are keep engaged to the game.
project.jobdesk: Taking role as developer, my responsibilities are to manage project workflow repository and create backend flow process. To achieve this, I manage the repository and monitor the workflow while also manage Commits/Pull Requests in the repository. I also contributed in creating the backend process, managing the project structure for assets and database. As the results, other developer members could use this database and assets easily, and can implement it in the application.

project.title: Color Sync
project.concept: Color Sync is a game created on iOS platform that allows you to compete with others to show how accurate you can match a color.
project.reasoning: During tech exploration session at Apple Developer Academy, every team can freely decide on what technology they want to explore. One of the technology that my team choose were Multipeer Connectivity Framework. Color Sync is a game created on iOS platform that allows you to compete with others to show how accurate you can match a color. This application already cover how to send and receive avarious type of data streamed and how to connect to other peers using local connectivity.
project.feature: This prototype of application is capable to be played by a person individually, or by a group of person up to 8 peers including the advertiser at the same time. This is possible because of Multipeer Connectivity framework provided by Apple Technology.
project.jobdesk: Taking role as developer, my responsibilities were to develop an application using the technology provided. To achieve this, I first do research on use cases that suitable to be tackled by this technology. After that, I create the application flow and create UI/UX design. After all the requirements completed, I then start develop the application on iOS using Swift. As the results, the application were completed and can be seen below and can be explored more on the publication link section.

project.title: Beesix: Step In, Stay Informed
project.concept: Beesix is an application that enable users to experience proximity marketing whenever user walk by the store and give realtime information around them.
project.reasoning: Proximity marketing is one approach that can be used as a marketing method. One way to do so is to collaborate with a simcard provider. However, this requires consideration because apart from being expensive, the range is too broad so the market is not specific. To tackle this problem, Beesix was created. Beesix is an application that enable users to experience proximity marketing whenever user walk by the store and give realtime information around them.
project.feature: This application are capable to enable user experience proximity marketing whenever user walk by the store and give realtime information around them. It can also detect whether the users are in beacon area or not. User also could save and share the information across another platform
project.jobdesk: Taking role as developer, my responsibilities are to manage project repository and develop proximity experience. To achieve this, I manage the repository and monitor the workflow while also manage PRs in the repository. I also contributed in developing the proximity experience using iBeacon technology, Core Location, and HTTP Request. As the results, Beesix are now available on App Store and users can experience proximity marketing as long as the store have our IoT device.

project.title: Beesix Bussiness
project.concept: Beesix for Business is a supporting app for IoT Device and Beesix application to help business owner manage products and enables proximity marketing experiences for their customers.
project.reasoning: Proximity marketing is one approach that can be used as a marketing method. One way to do so is to collaborate with a simcard provider. However, this requires consideration because apart from being expensive, the range is too broad so the market is not specific. To tackle this problem, Beesix was created. Beesix is an application that enable users to experience proximity marketing whenever user walk by the store and give realtime information around them.
project.feature: This application are capable to connect with the IoT device ‘The Bee’ using BLE technology. the application can also setup the device and manage/organize message broadcasted in the device via the application. While for the device, it act as a beacon so whenever user who has Beesix app walk by the device, it can give the beacon identifier for realtime information about the store.
project.jobdesk: Taking role as iOS developer and IoT engineer, my responsibilities are to manage project repository and connect device via application. To achieve this, I manage the repository and monitor the workflow while also manage PRs in the repository. I also contributed in developing the connection between IoT device and application using BLE technology. As the results, Beesix Business are now available on Testflight and users can try the application as long as the user have the IoT device.
